name: Mind The Magma
description:
Mind The Magma

Your role as a forest spirit is to  restore an unbalanced volcano spirit back to its normal benevolent state. Feed it mushrooms to heal it and different flowers to raise or lower its temperature. If balanced in temperature and healed the spirit will be restored. But watch out the more unbalanced the temperature the more the Volcano will shake and throw boulders capable of squashing anything beneath them.

Warning: This game can shake the screen a lot.

Controls

A -Move Left

D - Move Right

Space - Jump

E - Throw 

This game was made to participate in the Godot Wild Game Jam #49
